name: Maplewood Middle School
general_info: Maplewood Middle School is operated by the South Orange Maplewood Public Schools. The school enrolls students in grades six through eight. Its guidance and counseling department assists students in their educational and career development. The school s curriculum includes mathematics, science, social studies, language arts, music, Spanish, French and special education. Its library encourages the interests through reading and provides resources and materials, such as books to support student achievements and curricular goals and objectives. South Orange Maplewood Public Schools operates various schools, such as elementary, middle and high schools. Maplewood Middle School is located in Maplewood, N.J.

name: Belmont Runyon Public School
general_info: Belmont Runyon Elementary School serves students in prekindergarten through grade five. The school s curriculum includes classes in mathematics, science, world languages and technology education. Its language arts literacy program includes guided reading, fluency and vocabulary development, interactive writing, reader's workshop, tutoring and writers workshop programs. Belmont Runyon Elementary School s activity classes include programs in art, music, drama and dance. Its technology laboratory and media center are equipped with computers and other resources. In addition, the school conducts classes in visual and performing arts. Belmont Runyon Elementary School is a part of Newark Public Schools, which governs other elementary, middle and high schools.

name: Weekday Nursery School
general_info: Established in 1968, Central Presbyterian Church Weekday Nursery School & Kindergarten is a part of part of the Christian education program of Central Presbyterian Church. It enrolls 2-to-5-year-old students, offers a full day of kindergarten classes, and its curriculum includes physical education instruction, music programs, field trips and weekly library visits. The school also provides various enrichment programs for 4-year-olds that provide the children with varied experiences to stimulate intellectual and creative growth. The school s teachers are members of the National Association for the Education of Young Children and attend professional workshops regularly. Central Presbyterian Church Weekday Nursery School & Kindergarten is located in Summit, N.J.

name: Raritan High School
general_info: Raritan High School has an enrollment of more than 1,000 students in grades nine through 12. The school is affiliated with the Hazlet Township School District and provides various facilities to students, including a library and media center, cafeteria and computer and science laboratories. Its curriculum includes English, mathematics, American history, business studies, home economics, science, and physical and health education. The sports activities offered by the school include volleyball, basketball, cheerleading, swimming and wrestling. It also has a parent booster association that organizes athletic events and assists in fundraising activities. The school provides career counseling and information about colleges and scholarships to students. Raritan High School is located in Hazlet, N.J.

name: Summit City Board Of Education
general_info: Summit Public Schools provides education to students in grades kindergarten through 12. Its curriculum includes various subjects, such as business, English, mathematics, science, foreign languages, physical education and social studies. In addition, the schools offer training classes in reading, writing and communication. The services offered by the schools include academic guidance, career counseling, educational assistance and transportation. The extracurricular activities offered by the schools include band, chorus, drama, newspaper, orchestra, yearbook, prevention council and student government. It provides various sports activities that include badminton, cross country, football, volleyball, golf, swimming and diving. The schools are located in Summit, N.J.

name: Chancellor Avenue Annex School
general_info: Chancellor Avenue Annex School offers a range of academic and recreational programs for the intellectual, social and physical development of students. The school enrolls students in kindergarten through grade two. It has a work force of more than 20 employees, including teachers, social workers, therapists, physicians, custodians and counselors. Chancellor Avenue Annex School provides instruction in physical education, art and music. The school encourages the participation of parents in several school activities. It is located in Newark, N.J., and is a part of Newark Public Schools, which operates adult education, human resources, teaching and learning and facilities departments. Newark Public Schools serves more than 40,000 students in elementary, middle and high schools.

name: Raritan Valley Elementary School
general_info: Raritan Valley School offers a range of educational programs for students in kindergarten through grade six. It enrolls more than 350 students every year. The school offers classes in math, social studies and science. Raritan Valley School also provides programs in Spanish. It organizes various events and activities, including lip sync contest, book and science fairs, winter and spring concerts, and parent and student activity nights. The school has a staff of more than 30 teachers. It is a part of the Hazlet Board of Education, which is a school district that governs various elementary, middle and high schools. Raritan Valley School is located in Hazlet, N.J.

name: The Italian Cultural Foundation at Casa Belvedere
general_info: Casa Belvedere, The Italian Cultural Foundation, is a unique 2.75 acre cultural campus and community center on Grymes Hills with an amazing view of the Verrazano Bridge and the New York City Harbor. It is a registered 501 (3) not for profit organization that seeks to preserve, promote, and celebrate the rich heritage of Italy by encouraging an appreciation of the Italian language, arts, literature, history, fashion, cuisine, and commerce through various educational programs, exhibits, and events.  The historical mansion is available for private events. This unique space with outstanding views can accommodate you and your guests for any special occasion.

name: Holy Family Academy
general_info: Opened in 1925, Holy Family Academy is a Catholic college preparatory school for young women. Its educational program includes various courses in theology, science, English, social studies, math, physical education, fine arts, foreign languages, and business and technology. The school offers a variety of mini-courses and seminars. Holy Family Academy maintains a guidance department that counseling services for academic support, personal development and college advisement. Its library media center consists of books, magazines, pamphlets, audiovisual materials and computers with software and Internet access. The school also provides interscholastic athletic programs that include cross-country, soccer, tennis, volleyball, basketball, swimming, cheerleading, bowling, and track and field. Additionally, Holy Family Academy maintains various clubs, such as the Alumni Association, Mother s Club, Father s Club and the St. Joseph's Guild. Located in Bayonne, N.J., the school is accredited by the Middle States Association of Colleges and Schools.

name: Conerly Road Elementary School
general_info: Conerly Road Elementary School serves students in prekindergarten through grade four. It provides instruction in fine, visual and performing arts. The school s students perform dances, recitals and concerts as a part of their curriculum. Conerly Road Elementary School has a parent-teacher organization that supports several fundraising events. Its facilities include a library, cafeteria and playground. The school offers academic programs in language arts, reading, mathematics, science and social studies. In addition, Conerly Road Elementary School organizes night outings for parents. The school is located in Somerset, N.J., and is a part of Franklin Township Public Schools, which governs various elementary, middle and high schools. The district operates through administration, transportation, student services and human resources departments.

name: Allen W Roberts Elementary
general_info: Allen W. Roberts Elementary School serves more than 600 students in grades prekindergarten through six. Its curriculum includes classes in geography, history, language arts, English and physical education. Its visual arts program includes classes in clay making and sculpting. Allen W. Roberts Elementary School provides guidance, basic skills instruction, and speech, occupational and physical therapies for students. The school also offers special programs that include magnet interest, and gifted and talented programs. The school s media center offers books and magazines. Additionally, the school offers food services for students. Allen W. Roberts Elementary School is part of the New Providence School District and is located in New Providence, N.J.

name: Francis School
general_info: Francis School is an educational institution that offers online courses for high school students. It provides instruction in English, math, science and social studies. The school employs instructors who offer academic supports for students through electronic mail. It also has an online bulletin board to post questions and start conversations with instructors and classmates. Francis School has a technical support department that provides assistance with computer and Internet problems. It also provides financial assistance services. It provides access to a list of additional resources and Web sites. The school is accredited by the New York State Department of Education. Francis School is located in Staten Island, N.Y.

name: Gym Jams Nursery School
general_info: Gym Jams Nursery School is one of the child achievement program locations operated by The Community YMCA, which focuses on the implementation of Judeo-Christian principles for the spiritual development of people. The parent organization administers the Learn to Swim program. It also maintains the Camp Arrowhead Outdoor Recreation Center, which conducts swimming, gardening, cooking and dance classes and has operations in New Jersey. The Community YMCA s counseling and social services program provides outpatient and in-home counseling for mental health and substance abuse, foster family support, mentoring and child visitation programs for more than 1,600 children, adults, families and groups. It also offers online donation forms.

name: Florence M Gaudineer Middle
general_info: Located in Springfield, N.J., Florence M. Gaudineer Middle School offers a wide range of programs that include art, music, agricultural science, technology, computer and band to students in grade six through eight. The school s curriculum also includes programs in social science, business, mathematics and science. It athletic department offers a variety of sports activities, such as football, softball, basketball, soccer and wrestling. The school also offers a variety of clubs that include fishing, literary magazine, writing fair, yearbook and spelling bee. Florence M. Gaudineer Middle School additionally provides various classes in computer, technology and physical education. Its media center offers a wide collection of books, magazines, journals and also has computers that provide an electronic database. The school s staff comprises academic coaches, counselors, media specialists, school nutrition managers and speech therapists.

name: Watchung School Superintendent
general_info: Watchung Borough Schools offers educational programs to students in grades kindergarten through eight. Its curriculum includes subjects, such as social studies, science, technology, mathematics, computers, and health and physical education. The school s subjects also include foreign languages, social sciences, and language and fine arts. It has various facilities that include a cafeteria, media center and a computer laboratory. The sports activities offered by the school include basketball, baseball, volleyball, athletics, tennis, soccer and track. The school also provides a variety of extracurricular activities that include field trips, dance, drama and orchestra. It also has clubs that include key, science and horticulture clubs. The school is located in Watchung, N.J.

name: World Academy
general_info: The World Academy, located in Elizabeth, N.J., operates a range of training programs for trade organizations and associations. The academy conducts workshops and seminars on import export logistics. It offers classes in documentation and compliance management. The academy also provides lessons in harmonized tariff schedule management. The World Academy operates training programs in custom license brokerage. Its hazardous material program focuses on the development of necessary skills for dangerous goods shipment. The academy conducts a professional compliance manager certification program. In addition, it maintains an online bookstore and registration forms. The World Academy maintains a staff of instructors.

name: Benjamin Franklin School
general_info: Founded in 1915, Benjamin Franklin School 13 offers academic programs for more than 960 students in pre-kindergarten through grade six. The school s curriculum includes math, English, science and social studies. It also provides a variety of enrichment and cultural activities. Benjamin Franklin School 13 features a cafeteria, library and several classrooms. In addition, the school offers guidance counseling and special education programs. It is governed by Elizabeth Public School, which manages several elementary, middle and high schools. The district s schools provide several athletic activities, such as volleyball, football, basketball, and track and field. Its schools additionally offer English as a Second Language and gifted and talented education programs.

name: Keyport Central School
general_info: Keyport Central School offers its services for students in prekindergarten through grade seven. The school is located in Keyport, N.J., and is governed by the Keyport Public Schools. It offers a wide range of academic subjects, including English, language arts, literature, science, social studies, mathematics and algebra. In addition, it provides music, fine arts, foreign language computer application and health and physical education classes. The school houses a variety of regular facilities and also an art gallery that holds its student s art exhibitions. The school also has a parent-teacher association encourages a wide interest in books, magazines, trips, hobbies and current affairs and participation in community organizations for children for their overall development. Keyport Central School offers a wide range of sports activities, including basketball, baseball, softball and hockey.

name: New Dorp High School
address: 465 New Dorp Ln, Staten Island, NY 10306
general_info: New Dorp High School offers courses in various subjects, such as mathematics, social sciences, history, geography and English. It also provides extracurricular programs in physical education and fine arts. The school offers financial aid according to the needs of the students. Its counseling department deals with academic, personal and social and career development of the students. It additionally has a parent-teacher organization that supports the development programs and activities of the school. The school s library center provides journals, reference books, magazines, newspapers and Internet access as well. The athletics activities offered by the school include football, basketball, cheerleading, soccer, volleyball and wrestling. New Dorp High School is located in Staten Island, N.Y.

name: Keyport High School
general_info: Keyport High School offers a range of courses in fine arts, business and technology, accounting, English, math, music, physical education and science. It is located in Keyport, N.J., and is a part of Keyport Public Schools. It has several clubs and organizations that include Friends of the Arts, a parent-teacher association, and mother's, alumni and summer reading clubs. The school provides newsletters, handbooks and booklets to parents. It offers classes in drama, art, business, English, family and consumer science, industrial arts, mathematics, music, physical education, science, social studies and world languages. The school additionally has a library and learning center that provides a variety of books, periodicals, instructional notes and videos.

name: Robert Morris School
general_info: Robert Morris Elementary School 18 provides academic classes in a variety of subjects, such as language literacy, reading, mathematics, technology education, science, spelling and social studies. In addition, it teaches music, art, chorus, media, physical education and world languages. It has a team of guidance counselors and social workers that assists students in career counseling and planning and academic and personal concerns. Robert Morris Elementary School 18 supports a conflict resolution and character education program that helps students in making sound decisions and increasing social skills. The school has an annual enrollment of more than 500 students in prekindergarten through fifth grade. Robert Morris Elementary School 18 is a part of Elizabeth Public Schools and is located in Elizabeth, N.J.

name: Scotch Plains-Fanwood School
general_info: Scotch Plains Elementary School One is a part of the Scotch Plains- Fanwood Public Schools and provides education to students in grades kindergarten through four. It provides classes in a wide variety of subjects that include English, family and consumer sciences, mathematics, music and special education. The school s sports department offers a range of activities that include wrestling, hockey, bowling, football and wrestling. It has a media center that provides books, journals and provides access to Internet.  Additionally, the school provides classes in health and physical education. Scotch Plains Elementary School One also provides a range of programs   for the physical and mental development of students and is located in Scotch Plains, N.J.

name: Livingston Park Elementary
general_info: Livingston Park Elementary School, located in North Brunswick, N.J., is a learning center that provides educational services to students in kindergarten through fifth grade. The school provides a variety of academic programs, including English as a second language, gifted education, and speech, physical and occupational therapies. It operates a parent-teacher association that sponsors field trips and organizes academic programs and social events. The school offers a range of extracurricular activities, including art, physical education, and vocal and instrumental music. In addition, it provides food, medical care and counseling services. Livingston Park Elementary School is governed by North Brunswick Township Public Schools.

name: Nicholas M Butler School
general_info: Established in 1958, Nicholas Murray Butler School No. 23 enrolls students in pre-kindergarten through grade eight. The school offers guidance counseling services and speech therapy. It provides a variety of academic programs in mathematics, social studies, science and language arts. Nicholas Murray Butler School No. 23 also offers instructional services in technological communications, music and art. The school provides a range of after-school enrichment programs. It is governed by Elizabeth Public Schools, which operates elementary, middle and high schools. The district maintains human resources, information technology and special services departments. Its schools  athletic activities include basketball, bowling, swimming, wrestling, and track and field.

name: Superintendent Of Schools
general_info: The Superintendent of Schools administers East Brunswick Public Schools, a school district that operates various elementary, middle and high schools. The Superintendent of Schools is aided by a deputy superintendent, assistant superintendents for human resources, and student activities and services, a business administrator, and directors of support services and community relations. The school district serves more than 9,000 students in grades kindergarten through 12 and offers various academic and extracurricular activities. Its academic curriculum includes language arts, mathematics, social studies, performing arts, world languages, science, reading and physical education. The district s finance department prepares the annual budget for schools. The school superintendent s office is located in East Brunswick, N.J.

name: Bowne Munro Elementary School
general_info: Bowne-Munro Elementary School offers academic programs to more than 300 students in kindergarten through grade five. The school provides academic programs in English, mathematics, social studies and science. Bowne-Munro Elementary School offers an accelerated reader program that encourages students to read books for pleasure on a daily basis. The school has a library and media center that provides a range of books, newspapers, encyclopedias and electronic databases. Bowne-Munro Elementary School is a part of the East Brunswick Public Schools. It offers a physical education program that promotes fitness and social, team and individual skills. The school is located in East Brunswick, N.J.

name: Chittick Elementary School
general_info: Chittick Elementary School offers academic classes in physical education, art, music, foreign language, math, reading, English, social studies and science. It is affiliated with the East Brunswick Public Schools and serves more than 500 students in grades kindergarten through five. It offers an accelerated reader program that provides a summary and analysis of results to monitor quantity and quality of reading practice engaged in by the students. The school provides a variety of clubs and activities, such as chime choir, computer club, early act, peer mediation, peer tutoring, safety patrol, school newspaper, student council, video newsmakers and yearbook. Chittick Elementary School offers early morning program that includes a variety of activities, such as board games, arts and crafts and reading.

name: Cornerstone Christian School
general_info: Cornerstone Christian School provides learning opportunities and extracurricular programs for students. The school offers classes in pre-kindergarten through grade eight. general_info: One of eight schools of the University of Medicine and Dentistry of New Jersey, Robert Wood Johnson Medical School, has more than 2,500 faculty members. Spread out on campuses in Piscataway, New Brunswick and Camden, Robert Wood Johnson Medical School conducts basic and clinical research in a wide range of biomedical sciences. On its three campuses, the school houses twenty academic departments and six major research centers and institutes. In fiscal year 2000, externally sponsored research reached $82.5 million. Additionally, 10 patents were issued to RWJMS researchers and three license agreements were signed for processes or techniques developed at the school. Founded in 1962, the school is ranked among the top fifty primary care medical schools in the United States and rated second for community health.

general_info: Mr Driving School has been proudly serving NJ since 2006. Our goal is to prepare students to become safe drivers. We drive on the same roads as our students and don't want to push someone through programming just to satisfy their desire to get a license. We believe it is essential to work together with parents / guardians to give teens practice and real life experiences. Everyone has different needs and we work to provide each student with an individualized approach to driving instruction. We are committed to treating everyone with respect and honesty, giving quality customer service from the first contact through the final testing process.

Ross University s medical school s campus is located in Dominica. Students also attend a semester of classes at the school s location in Miami. The university s veterinary campus is on the island of St. Kitts in the Federation of St. Christopher and Nevis. Ross University is headquartered in Edison, N.J.

name: Jewish Board-Family & Children
general_info: Jewish Board of Family and Children's Services serves more than 65,000 New Yorkers annually through more than 175 community-based programs, residential facilities and day-treatment centers. The agency offers specialty training related to families, children and group psychotherapy. It provides a variety of services for the rehabilitation and intervention of children, adolescents and their families. Jewish Board of Family and Children's Services also accepts referrals from juvenile courts, hospitals, psychologists, psychiatrists, counselors, social workers and school administrators. In addition, the organization offers behavior modification, community recreation, independent living skills, medication monitoring and parenting skills development and counseling. It also provides in-home case management and intensive therapy, domestic violence and parenting assessments, and educational and motivational support services.

The school conducts a spring arts festival that features music and fine arts presentations by students. Connecticut Farms Elementary School offers the Open Court language program, which includes instruction on phonetic skills to enable students in decoding new and unfamiliar words. In addition, it has a parent-teacher association that sponsors various activities, such as school fairs, family fun nights, holiday shows, art festivals and book swaps. Connecticut Farms Elementary School also offers English as a Second Language and special education programs, as well as gifted and talented education.

It provides speech services and English as a second language classes and literacy groups and basic skills to those students who need extra assistance. It additionally provides tutorial programs for students requiring additional assistance. It has a pupil assistance committee that works with teachers to develop strategies for students who are experiencing difficulties. Its parent-teacher organization raises significant funds to enable students to participate in class trips and sponsors cultural arts programs throughout the year. It is located in Cliffwood, N.J.

Bloustein Distinguished Scholars, youth in city government, Rutgers Scholars, congressional scholars and Newark College of Arts and Sciences.

name: Staten Island Academy
address: 715 Todt Hill Rd, Staten Island, NY 10304
general_info: You are invited to visit Staten Island's only non-profit, independent school. Yes, we are in New York City but it certainly doesn't feel that way!  We are located on a beautiful 12-acre campus on Todt Hill.  We are small, personal and friendly.  Come to one of our many Open Houses, take a tour, see the classrooms, the art barn, the science and computer labs and library.  After you visit Staten Island Academy you will see the difference.  Our students and teachers shine!  OUR MISSION  Beginning our second century as a co-educational college preparatory school, Staten Island Academy is committed to providing a child-centered education of superior quality.  Enrolling students in  Pre-Kindergarten through twelfth grade, our objective is educating the whole child, while fostering intellectual, creative, social and physical development.  Within a collegial campus environment, in small classes, and through extracurricular activities, we encourage our students to participate actively in an educational community that promotes ethical leadership, self-reliance and critical thinking.  Believing in the inherent strenghts of a diverse citizenry, we celebrate the cultural difference, individual interests and personal talents of our student body.

It utilizes several pedagogical methodologies, including video modeling, discrete trial and incidental teaching, visual and written schedules, and written and audio scripts. Additionally, the district conducts parent training sessions, workshops, field trips, recreational activities and vocational programs.

name: Capri Institute of Hair Design-Kenilworth
general_info: CAPRI Institute of Hair Design was founded in 1961.  The founder was highly regarded and well known throughout the tri-state area as “the man with the golden scissors.”  He asserted a vision that could reach far beyond the mainstream of the industry and planted a solid seed rooted out of his love of teaching. His passing in early 1983, CAPRI Institute, Cosmetology Training Centers have continued to flourish and demand the highest of standards under the assured direction and focus of a new ownership.  Along with the energetic expertise of the Director: including the enduring dedication of the Area Supervisor, Office Manager, Controller, and the established guidance of CAPRI Institute Staff, Faculty and Instructors; together, have mad CAPRI the preferred choice in beauty education.  This collective effort has propelled CAPRI’s five campuses including Clifton, Kenilworth, Brick, Paramus and Roxbury into the permanent fixtures that they are today. In combination with its resilient reputation, CAPRI Institute has consistently demonstrated and encouraged excellence with true commitment for continual growth. We offer programs in Cosmetology, Skin Care, Nail Technology, Barber, Brush Up and Instructor Training.    CAPRI participates in various Federal Student Financial Aid Programs as well as scholarships.  If you want to be the best in the beauty industry- CALL TODAY TO FIND OUT ABOUT OUR NEXT OPEN HOUSE!

name: FasTracKids / Eye Level Learning Center
general_info:
FasTracKids / Eye Level Learning Center is a New York-based comprehensive academic enrichment center for young children. The learning center runs daytime preschool, after-school, tutoring, test prep, summer camp, and enrichment programs for children between the ages of two and ten years old. By creating age-appropriate engaging curriculum, the learning center provides children with an educational advantage, and a means to develop a lifelong love of learning. 
 
  FasTracKids instills children with the techniques they need to become master test-taking, and self-sufficient learners. Each academic enrichment program is informed by research-based innovative methods of early childhood education. By exploiting the developmentally impactful period in a child’s life through a unique multisensory approach, FasTracKids increases their capacity for critical thinking. From Math and English programs to ERB test prep, it is the interactive learning environment, as well as state-of-the-art educational technologies which makes it fun for kids to discover and explore new concepts and ideas. 
 
  One of the learning center’s foremost programs is the FasTracKids CORE. The CORE is an enrichment program designed to stimulate the mental development of your inherently gifted three to seven year old child. Professional educators tirelessly pursue the goal of preparing children for school and life by developing creative thinking, problem solving, and communication skills. 
 
  FasTracKids / Eye Level Learning Center facilitates learning processes in 12 subject areas with fun, learning activities for kids. Whether your child needs help retaining their everyday elementary curriculum, or test prep in New York, visit FasTracKids online to find out how to give your child they confidence they need to succeed.

name: Peace N Joy Academy Montessori School
general_info:
Peace N Joy Montessori School is an early childhood Montessori School located in Somerset, New Jersey. 
 
 
We provide a safe, happy and stimulating learning experience; we are a school with outstanding curriculum, programs and staff. Our classrooms are fully equipped with Montessori materials. All areas of Montessori Education are provided for the children. 
 
 
Our staff has been specifically selected, not only to meet the educational requirements of the state, but because in their hearts they truly care for children. We are determined not to be a mere institution, but rather an extension of your family, helping your child arrive at his/her highest scholastic and social potential.   
 
 
Parents are encouraged to participate in the education of their children.  
 
 
Recently, there has been a change in ownership of the school. The new director, a Certified Montessori teacher with extensive experience of working with children for over a decade, is committed to enhance the school curriculum and further improve the overall experience for you and your child.  
 
 
For more information, please contact Sharbani, Director of the School, at the contacts given above.

name: Save A Life Teaching
general_info: How to Deal With Emergencies Emergencies happen. They strike us at work, at home, and even at places where we least expect them. Give Hope, Save Lives Enhance your life-saving skills with our help. We are more than happy to teach you basic and advanced skills. We are Always Ready to Serve We have highly experienced CPR trainers, emergency medical technicians, and fire rescuers ready to assist you. If you have any concerns about our training courses, feel free to talk to any of our staff members.  We help you with the classes you need, on'-site wherever you are and it's all affordable. Training and classes offered include: Heart Saver CPR & AED CEVO III AHA BLS Health Care Provider/Renewal Child Safety & Babysitting 911 Telecommunications Certification Emergency Medical Despath (EMD) Emergency Medical Response Bloodborne Pathogens Training Hazard Communication (RIght-to-Know) Medical Oxygen Certification EMS Consulting First Aid (Basic, Pediatric, Advanced and Wilderness) Mavo Friends and Family CPR Emergencies don't wait-You Shouldn't Either Be ready to deal properly with a crisis. They strike us at work, at home and even at places where we least expect them. Saving a Life Teaching LLC in South River, New Jersey is here to provide yo with the right tools, like CPR and first aid training, to deal with emergencies the right way.

name: Kean University
general_info: Kean University is a public metropolitan university serving undergraduate and graduate students in the liberal arts, the sciences, and the professions. The University dedicates itself to the intellectual, cultural, and personal growth of all its members C/B?B=students, faculty, and professional staff. In particular, the University prepares students to think critically and creatively;to adapt to changing social, economic, and technological environments;and to serve as active and contributing members of their communities. Kean offers a wide range of demanding programs that provide the high quality of instruction and academic support services necessary to assure its socially, linguistically, and culturally diverse students the means to reach their full potential, including students from academically disadvantaged backgrounds, students with special needs, and adults returning or entering higher education. Kean is steadfast in its dedication to maintaining an educational environment in which diversity can flourish and an atmosphere in which mutual respect characterizes relations among the members of a pluralistic community. The University seeks to combine excellence with equity in providing opportunities for all students. Kean is a teaching university, and Kean faculty dedicate themselves to student learning as well as academic rigor. The focus on teaching excellence is supported by a commitment to research, scholarship, creative work, and innovative uses of technology. The focus includes the advancement of knowledge in the traditional disciplines and the enhancement of skills in professional areas. Kean is an interactive university, and the University serves as a major resource for regional advancement. Kean collaborates with business, labor, government and the arts, as well as educational and community organizations and provides the region with cultural events and opportunities for continuous learning. name: Rahway High School
general_info: Rahway High School is a four-year public school serving students in grades nine through 12. The school has an enrollment of more than 1,000 students and is a part of the Rahway School District. It provides advanced-placement courses in biology, calculus, American History and English. The school offers a variety of athletic and nonathletic cocurricular activities, such as academic decathalon team, dance, band, chess club, National Art Honor Society, French and Italian clubs, National Honor Society and key club. It has athletic teams in several sports, including wrestling, basketball, volleyball, basketball, football and soccer. The school also provides financial aid to eligible students. Rahway High School is accredited by the Middle States Association of Secondary Schools and is located in Rahway, N.J.

name: Harbor Learning Center
address: 1017 King Georges Post Rd, Edison, NJ 08837
general_info: Our preschool serves children ages 2 1/2 years to 6 years old.  Classroom are enriched with educational learning stations and a hands on curriculum to get the best education for your little learners.  We are a family oriented school with a clean, homelike and friendly environment.  Our teachers and assistants are professional and well trained in many core curriculum areas as well as simple child well being scenarios.  We offer full day preschool from 2 to 5 days a week.

name: James Madison Intermediate
general_info: James Madison Intermediate School, located in Edison, N.J., is a learning community that serves over 500 students in grades three through five. In addition to its core curriculum, the school offers classes in physical education, visual arts, and vocal and instrumental music. James Madison Intermediate School has a team of guidance counselors that promotes social skills and assists students in dealing with conflicts. The school organizes a variety of extracurricular programs, such as character counts, growing up and D.A.R.E. It also provides meal, medical and transportation services to the students. James Madison Intermediate School is a part of Public Schools of Edison Township, which serves more than 14,000 students.

name: Intermediate School 34
general_info: Totten Intermediate School 34 provides academic instruction and learning options to more than 1,100 students in grades six through eight. The school conducts classes in a variety of subjects, such as English, math, science, Spanish, computer education and social studies. Its range of extracurricular activities includes band, chorus, drama and cheerleading. Totten Intermediate School 34 also offers special education programs for students with developmental disabilities. The school operates a parent-teacher organization that works for student welfare. In addition, it provides speech and language therapies, as well as transportation services. Totten Intermediate School 34 organizes field trips, movie outings, basketball tournaments and fundraising events. The school is governed by The New York City Department of Education.

name: Metuchen High School
general_info: Metuchen High School offers education to students from grades nine through 12. Located in Metuchen, N.J., the school offers various classes, such as English, science, social studies, special education, foreign languages and practical arts. The school also offers a library and a media center and provides technical lessons, including fundamentals of business, industrial arts and computer programming. The school offers a variety of clubs, such as artistic visions, athletic training club, blue letter, bulldog's bark and cheerleading squad. It also offers various language and culture clubs, such as French, Spanish, German, Italian, junior, key and mock trial.

name: William C Mc Ginnis School
general_info: Located in Perth Amboy, N.J., William C McGinnis Middle School offers classes from grades five through eight. It consists of departments, including nurse and health, guidance, media center and athletics. The school s media center offers online databases, text periodicals and book links. Its guidance department operates a positive behavior support program that fosters home-school partnership and supports student-centered environment. The school also operates a math achievement program that focuses on integrating technology into the curriculum and instruction. Additionally, the school organizes parent-teacher meetings and offers in-service training workshops for parents. The William C McGinnis Middle School is a part of the Perth Amboy Public Schools.

name: Colorado Technical University
general_info:
It's time for a new kind of online educational experience: one that is personalized, guided by industry trends, driven by technology, and designed to help you reach your potential. Here at CTU, our online programs allow you to connect and network with students, faculty, advisors and alumni who share your passion for personal growth, educational advancement, and desire for career-focused skills. 
 
You can choose from a wide range of online degree programs in some of today's most in-demand fields, including Business Management, Engineering, Information Technology, Health Sciences and Security Studies. Our online learning options are flexible enough to accommodate your lifestyle, and our technologies provide the convenience you need to complete your degree even with a busy schedule.

name: Herbert Hoover Middle School
general_info: Herbert Hoover Middle School provides education to special needs students. Operating under Edison Township Public Schools, located in Edison, N.J., works towards ensuring that all students achieve academic success through the New Jersey Core Curriculum. The school provides academic lessons on a variety of subjects, such as English, health, physical education, mathematics, social studies, science, visual arts and world language. Herbert Hoover Middle School also offers health services, food services, athletics and general guidance to students.

name: Samuel E Shull School
general_info: Samuel E. Shull School, located in Perth Amboy, N.J., is a part of Perth Amboy Public Schools. It offers classes in grades five and six and enrolls more than 1,500 students. It provides an educational environment where students can discover and use their full potential. It provides a comprehensive educational program, including core subjects, such as mathematics, language arts, social studies and science. Additionally, special courses are offered, which include art, music, computer education, library and guidance. Community service projects are part of each grade. Samuel E. Shull School invites all students to take part in the school newspaper and student council and offers a variety of sports, including football, basketball, baseball and cheerleading.

name: Washington Avenue Elementary
general_info: Washington Avenue School is a learning center that is located in Chatham, N.J. The school enrolls more than 280 students in kindergarten through grade three. Its curriculum includes language arts, science, mathematics and social studies. The school conducts classes in Spanish and technology education. It also offers an accelerated reader program. Washington Avenue School supports activities, such as art and music. The school sponsors field trips to various local museums, outdoor environmental centers and community theaters. It operates a parent-teacher organization that conducts fundraising activities. In addition, the school offers medical care and a range of after-school enrichment programs. Washington Avenue School is a part of the School District of the Chathams.

name: Academy of Natural Health Sciences
general_info:
Massage Therapy, Nutrition and Holistic Health Training Programs. 
 
Thank you for your interest in the Academy of Natural Health Sciences.  
 
We are a New Jersey Department of Education Approved Private Vocational Massage and Nutrition School. In addition, all of the Academy's programs and courses are individually approved by the New Jersey Department of Education.  
 
The Academy advantage also includes expert instruction, small class size, low cost tuitions and easy payment plans. Please call us to make an appointment to see the school and talk about your interests.
